actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to commend Head Football Coach Paul "Bear" Bryant and the University of Alabama for having made the 1977 football season another memorable one for fans throughout the Nation.

summary.text: Extends the commendation of the Senate to the University of Alabama and other teams and their coaches and staffs for having provided millions of fans throughout the Nation a year of outstanding and wholesome competition that brings credit to their schools and to national collegiate football.

titles.title: A resolution to commend Head Football Coach Paul "Bear" Bryant and the University of Alabama for having made the 1977 football season another memorable one for fans throughout the Nation.
